sentences.sentence: At the same time, he published his autobiography, Moonwalker.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，出版了他的自传《外星战将》。

sentences.sentence: His fellow moonwalker, al Bean, never the most naturally gifted astronaut, compensated with sheer hard work.
sentences.translation: 与他一起漫步月球的伙伴艾尔•宾，从来都不是最有天赋的宇航员，靠的是勤能补拙。

sentences.sentence: Aptly named 'MoonWalker', these shoes rely on magnets to allegedly simulate walking in a low-gravity environment.
sentences.translation: 据称，这款名为“月球漫步者”的运动鞋据称可以用磁铁模拟太空的低重力环境。
